```{r setup}
library(readmat)
```

```{r bench}
bench::mark(
  r = {
    R.matlab::readMat(get_matlab("num-large-cube.mat"))$big

  cpp = {
    read_mat(get_matlab("num-large-cube.mat"))
  },
  check = TRUE,
  relative = TRUE
)
```
